## Releases

* **CMSSW_7_1_0_pre8** has been released 2+ weeks ago
    * Full details available [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/320094/contribution/0/material/slides/0.pdf)
	* The new simulation of Pixel Dynamic Inefficiency entered **pre7** and was _fixed_ in **pre8**
	    * See its effect in today's talk from Giuseppe.
* **CMSSW_7_2_X** branch has been opened
    * please submit your PR to this branch
	* requests to 71X are automatically forwarded to 72X
* Important developments almost ready missed 71X and should come early in 72X:
    1. Jet Core iteration [github-link](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/3859)
	1. **Hit Pattern** redesign
